title: Ep: 031 - The Art of Selling Broadway - Drew Hodges
description: Drew Hodges is the founder of Spot Design, in 1987, which was followed by the launch of the full service New York City advertising agency SpotCo, and most recently DrewDesignCo.  Drew has created branding and advertising campaigns that span three decades of theatrical shows and art institutions.  He has helped launch many iconic titles such as “RENT”, “Hamilton” and “Chicago” just to name a few.  We were honored to sit down with Drew to pull back the curtain on his storied career.
author: info@trentbell.com (Trent Bell)
